text: John H. Roelker House is a historic home located in downtown Evansville, Indiana. It was built in 1858, and is a three-story, four bay, brick dwelling. Note: This includes , , and Accompanying photographs It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1984. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Indiana Category:Houses completed in 1858 Category:Houses in Evansville, Indiana Category:National Register of Historic Places in Evansville, Indiana
title: John H. Roelker House
